modName: Theminblacks UNPB Armor Shop - Armor Compilation
summary: A compilation of the Replacer/Standalone armors from "Theminblacks UNPB Armor Shop" into one convenient download
descriptionHtml:
[heading][b]"Theminblacks UNPB Armor Shop" Armor Compilation by ColonolNutty[/b][/heading]
[color=yellow]Author:[/color] ColonolNutty
[heading][color=yellow]Where did these armors come from? Where can I get more info? Where can I see more/better pictures? Are there videos? How can I get only certain pieces?[/color][/heading]
[color= yellow]You can find the armors and more info/pictures (Also a few videos) at the authors([/color]Theminblack[color= yellow]) mod page [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19004] Theminblacks UNPB Armor Shop [/url].[/color]


[heading][color=green]Disclaimer[/color][/heading]
[color=yellow]All of the armors within this compilation belong to the author([/color]Theminblack[color=yellow]). I neither created nor modified any of these armor pieces. I merely packed them into a convenient download.[/color]
-ColonolNutty

[heading][color=red]Known Issues[/color][/heading]
[list]
[*] Certain hairs clip through the back of the BFPU Orcish helmet, not sure of a way around this without removing the hair completely
[/list]

[heading][color=yellow]Standalone armors for UNP:[/color][/heading]
[list]
[*]Standalone - Ancient Nord armor for UNP [color=green]v1.0[/color]
[*]Standalone - Nord Plate armor for UNP [color=green]v1.0[/color]
[*]Standalone - Battlefield Pickup Orcish armor for UNP [color=green]v1.0[/color]
[/list]

[color=red]*The Standalone/Replacer armors above REQUIRE the [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709] UNP [/url][color=red] body*[/color]

[heading][color=yellow]Replacer armors for UNP:[/color][/heading]
[list]
[*]Replacer - Ancient Nord armor for UNP [color=green]v1.0[/color]
[*]Replacer - Nord Plate armor for UNP [color=green]v1.0[/color]
[*]Replacer - Orcish armor for UNP [color=green]v1.0[/color] [color=yellow]*DOES NOT INCLUDE HELMET*[/color]
[/list]

[color=red]*The Standalone/Replacer armors above REQUIRE the [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709] UNP [/url][color=red] body*[/color]

[heading][color=yellow]Standalone armors for UNPB:[/color][/heading]
[list]
[*]Standalone - Barbarian armor for UNPB [color=green]v1.0[/color] - [color=yellow]Crafted under the "Leather" category at any smithy.[/color]
[*]Standalone - Nord Plate armor for UNPB [color=green]v1.0[/color]
[*]Standalone - Ancient Nord armor for UNPB [color=green]v1.1[/color]
[*]Standalone - Battlefield Pickup Orcish armor for UNPB [color=green]v1.0[/color]
[/list]

[color=red]*The Standalone/Replacer armors above REQUIRE the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900] UNPB [/url] body to work*[/color]

[heading][color=yellow]Replacer armors for UNPB:[/color][/heading]
[list]
[*]Replacer - Ancient Nord armor for UNPB [color=green]v1.2a[/color]
[*]Replacer - Nord Plate armor for UNPB [color=green]v1.3a[/color]
[*]Replacer - Orcish armor for UNPB [color=green]v1.0[/color] [color=yellow]*DOES NOT INCLUDE HELMET*[/color]
[/list]

[color=red]*The Standalone/Replacer armors above REQUIRE the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900] UNPB [/url] body to work*[/color]

[heading]Credits:[/heading]
[color=yellow]All credit for the armors[/color] - Theminblack
[color=yellow]Packing the armors into a compilation[/color] - ColonolNutty

[color=cyan]Included here are the credits from Theminblacks mod page:[/color]
[color=yellow]Dimon99 for UNP
Calyps for UNPB
Navetsea for the amazing skin textures[/color]
author: ColonolNutty

files.name: Combined Replacer - UNP
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed CTD for the Orcish armor
Fixed invisible parts
Fixed all pieces and parts not showing the blacksmithing menu
Reuploaded new esps
